hero.title: 1024GB Cloud Storage
hero.description: Easy to use, private and secure, reliable.
hero.footer: Your free and secure cloud storage by MegaBox

features.feature1: Stream your videos instantly from anywhere, on any device, with no buffering. Experience seamless playback with our advanced cloud streaming technology.
features.feature2: Your files are encrypted and safely stored in the cloud, accessible only by you. Enterprise-grade security ensures your data remains private and protected.
features.feature3: Upload videos with a single click and share them securely with your team or friends. Organize your content effortlessly with our intuitive interface.
features.feature4: Enjoy your videos in stunning HD and 4K quality, with adaptive streaming that adjusts to your connection speed for the best viewing experience.

step1.title: Sign Up & Upload
step1.desc: Create your free account and upload your first video in seconds. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to get started.

step2.title: Organize & Manage
step2.desc: Easily organize your videos into folders and manage your content. Keep everything tidy and accessible.

step3.title: Stream or Share
step3.desc: Stream your videos instantly or share them securely with others. Control who has access to your content.

features.feature5: Withdraw earnings upon reaching minimum threshold

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join our community today and experience the best service we have to offer.

footer.description: Secure cloud storage and file sharing platform. Store, share, and earn with confidence.

storage.title: Your Safe Place to Store Data
storage.description: Mega Box is a secure and reliable cloud platform designed to protect everything you care about. From important documents and business files to personal photos and videos, your data is always encrypted and stored safely.
storage.whyChooseDesc: We believe storing your data should be simple and stress-free. Here are some reasons why thousands of users trust Mega Box every day:

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: Every file you upload is protected with state-of-the-art encryption, ensuring your data stays private and secure.

storage.title: Generous Storage
storage.description: Enjoy up to {storage} of cloud space, giving you the freedom to save, organize, and access all your content whenever you need it.

access.title: Seamless Access
access.description: Whether you're working on your laptop, tablet, or phone, Mega Box keeps your files in sync across all your devices.

sharing.title: Safe Sharing Links
sharing.description: Share your files with confidence using secure links that protect your content and control who can access it.

earnings.title: Earn Money Safely with Mega Box
earnings.description: Mega Box isn't just a place to store your files—it's a platform where you can share your content and earn income securely. Whether you create videos, documents, or digital products, Mega Box makes it easy to monetize your work with confidence.
earnings.whyTrust: Why trust Mega Box for your earnings?
earnings.whyTrustDesc: We are committed to helping you grow your revenue while keeping your data and payments fully protected. Here are some of the reasons creators and businesses rely on us:

transactions.title: Secure Transactions
transactions.description: All financial operations are encrypted and processed through trusted payment providers, ensuring your earnings reach you safely and quickly.

content.title: Protected Content
content.description: Your files remain secure behind robust encryption, so you can confidently share your work without worrying about unauthorized access.

monetization.title: Flexible Monetization
monetization.description: Set your own prices, offer subscriptions, or share paid downloads—Mega Box gives you the tools to earn on your terms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about MegaBox referral program and services

q1.question: Why join the MegaBox referral program?
q1.answer: MegaBox is an innovative cloud storage app that offers 1024 GB of free lifetime cloud storage. Join the program and let's grow and succeed together.

q2.question: How can I earn commissions?
q2.answer: You earn a commission every time a new user registers on MegaBox using the link you shared.

q3.question: How can I track my commission?
q3.answer: You will be able to view detailed reports about your commissions and the number of registrations through your shared link in the Admin Center.

q4.question: When and how do I get paid?
q4.answer: You can see reward details in the Admin Center and withdraw your rewards. (This feature will be available in July 2025.) We will provide a dashboard where you can access all payout information.

q5.question: What does it cost to join?
q5.answer: Joining the program is completely free. You don't need to pay anything.

termsModal.title: Notice
termsModal.description: Before using the Site Manager Center, you must read and agree to the following agreement:
termsModal.rewardsRulesLink: Rules for rewards of the Site Manager Center on the web: Who is eligible for rewards?
termsModal.acceptTerms: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service and Rewards Rules
termsModal.welcomeText: Welcome to MegaBox ("we", "us", "the Service"). By accessing or using MegaBox, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree, do not use the Service.
termsModal.termsContent:
1. Eligibility

You must be at least 13 years old (or the legal minimum in your country) and not be prohibited from using online services under applicable law. If you use MegaBox on behalf of an organization, you confirm you have authority to bind that organization.

2. Description of the Service

MegaBox provides cloud storage for files and media, online streaming for supported video formats, link-based preview pages, a "Save Before Watch" feature, and a Promoter Program that lets creators earn from downloads or views. We may add, change, or remove features at any time.

3. Account Registration

When creating an account you agree to provide accurate information, secure your password, and accept responsibility for all activity under your account. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

4. User Content & Responsibility

You are solely responsible for all content you upload, save, share, stream, or publish using MegaBox. By uploading content you confirm that you own the rights to it or have permission to use it, and that it does not violate applicable laws or these Terms. MegaBox does not review all content but may remove or restrict content at its discretion.

5. Prohibited Content

Do not upload, share, or distribute content that includes:

  • Illegal content under U.S. or international law.
  • Copyrighted material without permission.
  • Sexual content involving minors or non-consensual intimate content.
  • Violence, hate speech, threats, malware, scams, or misleading advertising.
  • Content that violates privacy rights or attempts to exploit the Promoter Program.

Violations may result in immediate account termination.

6. Promoter Program

Promoters may choose one of two plans: Pay‑Per‑Download (PPD) or Pay‑Per‑View (PPV). A promoter may select only one plan at a time. Earnings depend on country-specific rates set by MegaBox. Fraudulent activity (fake views, bots, VPN abuse, multi-accounting) will result in permanent banning and forfeiture of earnings. MegaBox may modify or terminate the Promoter Program at any time.

7. Payments & Withdrawals

Payments are sent using methods available in the app or dashboard. We may require identity verification for withdrawals. Minimum payout thresholds apply. MegaBox may hold or refuse payment if fraud is suspected.

8. Intellectual Property

MegaBox and its logos, branding, and technology are owned by MegaBox Media Tech LLC or licensed to us. You retain ownership of your files but grant MegaBox a limited license to store, display, process (thumbnails, previews), and deliver them via sharing links. We do not claim ownership of your content.

9. Link Sharing & Preview Pages

Shared MegaBox links may show a preview page with file name, thumbnail, and "Save" or "Play" buttons. Users must save the file to their MegaBox account before watching/streaming. Users without the app may be redirected to download it. You are responsible for links you share.

10. Fair Usage Policy

To protect stability we may enforce bandwidth limits, storage limits, viewing restrictions, and anti‑abuse measures. Excessive or automated usage may result in restrictions or account limits.

11. Termination

We may suspend or terminate your account for violations of these Terms, prohibited content, fraud, or abuse of promotions. You may delete your account at any time from your profile settings.

12. Disclaimer of Warranty

The Service is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE". We do not guarantee that files will never be lost, that service will be uninterrupted, or that streaming quality will meet all expectations. Use of the service is at your own risk.

13. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by U.S. law, MegaBox is not responsible for lost files, lost earnings, or other damages resulting from use of the service. Any dispute is strictly between you and MegaBox Media Tech LLC.

14. Changes to These Terms

We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use after updates indicates acceptance of the revised Terms.

15. Contact Information

MegaBox Media Tech LLC
Email: support@megaboxapp.com
United States of America
termsModal.rewardsEligibilityTitle: Who is eligible to receive rewards?
termsModal.rewardsEligibilityDesc: To qualify for a reward, you must meet the following conditions:
termsModal.rewardsRule1: You must comply with MegaBox's Terms of Service.
termsModal.rewardsRule2: Your MegaBox account must not be suspended or terminated.
termsModal.rewardsRule3: Your account must have been activated within the last 90 days (for example, you recently logged in or shared new links).
termsModal.rewardsRule4: Both you and the new user you referred have followed and will continue to follow the MegaBox Admin Center rules.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - MegaBox
privacy.releaseDateValue: To be determined later upon the official launch of the app at the end of this month.
privacy.effectiveDateValue: Will be announced in conjunction with the official launch of the MegaBox app.
privacy.welcome: Welcome to MegaBox, a product of MegaTech Egypt ("MegaBox", "we", or "the Company"). We are glad you chose to use our services. We place the highest importance on protecting your privacy and are committed to taking all legal, technical, and organizational measures to keep your personal data secure and to handle it transparently.
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, store, process, use, and share your personal data when you interact with us through our website, the MegaBox app, or any of our available services.
privacy.principlesIntro: We fully recognize the importance of protecting your information in the digital world. For this reason, we commit to applying the following principles during all stages of processing your personal data:
privacy.consentNote: If you provide personal information about others through MegaBox (such as sharing files or sending invitations), you are responsible for obtaining their consent. We reserve the right to verify the legality of the source.
privacy.infoCollectionTitle: Types of Information We Collect and Why
privacy.infoCollectionDesc: We collect various types of data, whether you provide it directly or it is automatically collected during your use of our services, in order to improve your experience, protect service security, and deliver advanced and personalized functionality.
privacy.accountInfoDesc: Such as email, mobile phone number, or social media account data upon registration.
privacy.accountInfoPurpose: Used to activate the account, verify identity, secure the account, send notifications, and provide account recovery services if you forget your password.
privacy.userContentDesc: All files and folders you store on MegaBox, such as images, documents, videos, and audio files.
privacy.userContentPurpose: We store this content and provide features such as file synchronization across devices, sharing, quick access, and ensuring data security.
privacy.usageDataDesc: Activities within your account, such as uploading, deleting, sharing, or modifying files.
privacy.usageDataPurpose: Used to monitor performance, improve service quality, personalize experiences, and detect unusual or suspicious activity.
privacy.deviceInfoDesc: IP address, device type, operating system version, browser, language settings, and geolocation (with your permission).
privacy.deviceInfoPurpose: Used to secure your account, improve experience, and resolve technical or performance issues.
privacy.cookiesDesc: Small files saved on your device to improve performance and remember your preferences.
privacy.cookiesPurpose: Used for auto-login, faster navigation, content personalization, and usage analysis.
privacy.contactDataDesc: With your permission, we can access your address book to facilitate invitations and collaboration.
privacy.contactDataPurpose: Used only to enable sharing features easily and securely; we don't store or share this data without your consent.
privacy.clipboardDataDesc: When copying a link or invitation code.
privacy.clipboardDataPurpose: We read the clipboard to help you open the relevant link or file only.
privacy.analytics: We use smart analytics technologies (such as usage reports, automatic personalization, and behavioral classification) to deliver content and recommendations tailored to your preferences. You can decline this type of analysis at any time.
privacy.thirdPartyTitle: Sharing Personal Information with Third Parties
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We do not share your information without your consent, except in cases of legal or humanitarian necessity:
privacy.thirdParty1: Compliance with government authorities under applicable laws or regulations.
privacy.thirdParty2: Protecting the life, physical safety, or property of an individual from serious risk.
privacy.thirdParty3: Public health measures or protection of vulnerable groups.
privacy.minimizationNote: We follow the data minimization principle and record every sharing event, including:
privacy.minimization1: Name and contact of the recipient
privacy.userSharingDesc: When you use collaboration features, the following may be displayed:
privacy.userSharing4: Activity log related to shared files
privacy.userSharingNote: You can adjust visibility permissions in your account sharing settings at any time.
privacy.partnersDesc: We may share your data with:
privacy.partnersNote1: All sharing is governed by strict agreements and clear protection clauses.
privacy.partnersNote2: When using Google or Apple login, we share your information in accordance with their privacy policies.
privacy.protectionNote: Your data is deleted upon your request within 30 days, unless laws require retention.
privacy.storageDesc: Your data is stored on servers in Japan. We ensure the same security level when transferring data to any external party.
privacy.controllingDesc: You can exercise the following rights:
privacy.controlling6: Request a copy or transfer to another party
privacy.controllingNote: Requests are processed within a reasonable time, and we will inform you if any reason prevents approval.
privacy.changesDesc: If MegaBox is merged or sold, data will be transferred securely to the new entity with prior notice to you.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have questions or requests, contact us via:
privacy.contactResponse: We will respond within 7 business days.
privacy.footerNote: This document represents the official privacy policy of the MegaBox app and is legally binding from the date of the official launch.

removal.title: Removal Guidelines Policy – MegaBox
removal.summary1: MegaBox is firmly committed to protecting the privacy of its platform users, and constantly strives to provide a secure environment that respects applicable legal and ethical standards both locally and internationally.
removal.summary2: Although privacy is a core pillar of MegaBox services, the company acknowledges that it may be subject to certain legal limitations in specific cases, especially when protecting public safety or investigating unlawful activities. Therefore, MegaBox provides this guideline to explain how it handles legal requests in criminal or civil matters.
removal.summary3: This document aims to enhance transparency and clarity with all parties, including authorities, users, and partners. It ensures consistent and fair procedures when disclosure or intervention is needed.
removal.notice1: It is important to clarify this document does not create any legal obligations on MegaBox, nor establish any basis for legal liability. All contractual limitations in the Terms of Service apply equally. MegaBox reserves the right to modify, replace, or withdraw this document without prior notice.
removal.notice2: If any conflict arises between this guide and the Terms of Service or Privacy Policy, the Terms of Service prevail.
removal.summary4: Unless required by law, MegaBox retains discretion to determine the scope of disclosure in response to requests, considering the source and purpose.
removal.summary5: MegaBox recommends legal requestors contact the company in advance before submitting formal orders. This helps verify availability and avoid unnecessary steps, especially in emergencies.
removal.summary6: In critical situations threatening life or safety, MegaBox may preserve data and take precautionary measures without a direct court order, if sufficient guarantees are provided.
removal.summary7: MegaBox commits, when possible, to inform affected users unless prohibited by law or official orders.
removal.summary8: The most updated version is always available on the official MegaBox website.
removal.principles1: When handling disclosure requests, MegaBox operates from the principle that user data is confidential. It is disclosed only in clear cases requiring legal intervention.
removal.principles2: MegaBox encrypts all files, and only users can decrypt their content. The company cannot access encrypted files unless the user shares public links, grants permissions, or discloses credentials.
removal.principles3: While MegaBox is subject to Japanese law, it may consider requests from foreign authorities if accompanied by valid documents.
removal.principles4: MegaBox does not access files under investigation unless legally justified. Such decisions rely on objective assessment.
removal.principles5: MegaBox strives to notify affected users whenever possible.
removal.emergency1: Emergencies are defined as situations requiring immediate intervention to protect life or prevent serious harm. Japanese authorities may submit urgent requests with written assurances.
removal.emergency2: If MegaBox finds the request credible, it may act without a formal court order in good faith, including temporarily disabling access.
removal.emergency3: Requesting parties must accept responsibility for accuracy and indemnify MegaBox against consequences.
removal.emergency4: MegaBox coordinates with an authorized contact and provides dedicated emergency channels.
removal.prohibited1: MegaBox strictly prohibits activities that violate laws or promote harm. Prohibited content includes:
removal.prohibited2: Content related to child sexual exploitation (CSAM)
removal.prohibited3: Content involving harassment or direct threats
removal.prohibited5: Depictions of sexual assault on animals
removal.prohibited6: Material degrading human dignity or inciting hatred
removal.prohibited7: MegaBox reserves the right to remove content, suspend accounts, and cooperate with authorities.
removal.copyright1: MegaBox processes copyright infringement notices according to best practices and international standards. A detailed form is provided on the website.
removal.copyright2: Rights holders must provide complete information, including descriptions, links, and contact details:
removal.otherIP1: MegaBox applies the same standards to other IP violations, such as trademarks or patents.
removal.civil1: In civil lawsuits alleging IP infringement, MegaBox handles requests under Japanese law. This may include:
removal.civil4: A sworn affidavit or agreed documents
removal.civil5: All procedures must comply with local court rules in Japan.
removal.other1: For scenarios not covered here, MegaBox acts only based on Japanese law or recognized legal orders. It reserves discretion to decline unsupported requests.
removal.other2: Technical capabilities remain a key factor, alongside compliance with the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

feedback.title: Copyright Infringement Report

feedback.formDesc: Please provide accurate information to help us process your report
feedback.fileDesc: Please download the template file first, fill in the infringing URLs you wish to remove, and then upload it.
feedback.agreementLabel: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions.
feedback.agreement1: The information in this form is accurate and I am the owner/agent of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. If there is perjury, I am willing to bear legal responsibility.
feedback.agreement2: I have a belief that the use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
feedback.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 30KB
